channel.title: gdk on gobbi
channel.description: Recent content in gdk on gobbi

item.title: constants
item.description: BUTTON_MIDDLE The middle button. GDK_BUTTON_MIDDLE BUTTON_PRIMARY The primary button. This is typically the left mouse button, or the right button in a left-handed setup. GDK_BUTTON_PRIMARY BUTTON_SECONDARY The secondary button. This is typically the right mouse button, or the left button in a left-handed setup. GDK_BUTTON_SECONDARY CURRENT_TIME Represents the current time, and can be used anywhere a time is expected. GDK_CURRENT_TIME EVENT_PROPAGATE Use this macro as the return value for continuing the propagation of an event handler.
